name: Relax Frog
description:
You can be a frog who  can jump and relax on a calm lake, and maybe make some friends. You can't lose. It's ok if you are bored.

UPDATE #1-- •Added dragonflies • Fixed it so you dont have to wait so long for the turtle pal 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I started this game on Train Jam 2018 on the last night after spending most of my time looking out the window at beautiful scenery.  I finished it the next day in my cosy bedroom.

Thank you for making this game better:

Adriel Wallick (@MsMinotaur), Jose Pablo Monge (@Loko08), Antonio Uribe (@fire_tony), Sam (@seltzy), Oscar Coen (@oscar_coen), Kyle Olson (@KyleOlsonmabob).

Ps the frog's name is Doreen.
